title: Analyze the economic consequences of the Civil War

content.question:
Analyze the economic consequences of the Civil War with respect to any TWO of the following in the United States between 1865 and 1880.

Agriculture
Labor
Industrialization
Transportation

frqParts.text:
Analyze the economic consequences of the Civil War with respect to any TWO of the following in the United States between 1865 and 1880.

Agriculture
Labor
Industrialization
Transportation

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
